name: One Card Hero
description:
Collect the coins! Avoid the enemies! Score the points!

Power-up your robotic avatar by playing cards--but you can only hold one card at a time (that is, "you only get one").

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Click DISCARD to discard and draw a new card.
  • Click your CARD to activate the power (powers last 2 seconds)

CARD TYPES:

  • Coins x 2: coins are worth double points
  • Speed x 2: your avatar moves twice as fast
  • 1/2 Penalty: the penalty for enemies is halved
  • Invincible: your avatar is unaffected by enemies.
  • Alternate Path: while active, your avatar will take the alternate (blue) path wherever possible

Created for Ludum Dare 28 using Unity 4, 2D Toolkit, and Thinkscroller. Other tools used: GIMP (graphics), Audacity (recording & editing).

Music available on Soundcloud. Full version for Android released on Google Play and Amazon Appstore.
